sql_e2e.question: List all products that are below their reorder level in any territory
sql_e2e.expected_sql:
SELECT
    p.name AS product_name,
    p.sku,
    t.name AS territory_name,
    i.quantity_on_hand,
    i.reorder_level
FROM
    inventory i
JOIN
    products p ON i.product_id = p.product_id
JOIN
    territories t ON i.territory_id = t.territory_id
WHERE
    i.quantity_on_hand < i.reorder_level;
